sources.title: The Skull Murder Mystery
sources.description: Title: The Skull Murder Mystery Summary: When the skeleton of a young man is dug up in an alley, a mysterious Chinese merchant and his eccentric upstairs tenants come under suspicion. The team of Inspector Carr and Dr. Crabtree use the skull of the victim to solve the murder. Directed by: Joseph Henabery Actors: Donald Meek, John Hamilton, Joanna Roos Production Company: Warner Bros. Release Date: March 1932 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 When the skeleton of a young man is dug up in an alley, a mysterious Chinese merchant and his eccentric upstairs tenants come under suspicion. The team of Inspector Carr and Dr. Crabtree use the skull of the victim to solve the murder.

metadata.Plot: When the skeleton of a young man is dug up in an alley, a mysterious Chinese merchant and his eccentric upstairs tenants come under suspicion. The team of Inspector Carr and Dr. Crabtree use the skull of the victim to solve the murder.
